commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
version: '3'
services:
  keycloak:
    # image: docker.io/bitnami/keycloak
    image: quay.io/keycloak/keycloak:25.0.2
    command: start-dev
    environment:
      DB_VENDOR: postgres
      DB_ADDR: postgres
      DB_PORT: 5432
      DB_DATABASE: keycloak
      DB_USER: keycloak
      DB_PASSWORD: password
      KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_USER: admin
      ADMIN_USER: admin
      KEYCLOAK_ADMIN: admin
      KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD: admin
      ADMIN_PASSWORD: admin
      KEYCLOAK_LOG_LEVEL: INFO,org.keycloak.services.managers:DEBUG,org.keycloak.events:DEBUG,org.keycloak.credential:DEBUG
    volumes:
      - ./keycloak/log:/fluentd/log
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    depends_on:
      - fluentd
      - postgres
    links:
      - fluentd
    logging:
      driver: fluentd
      options:
        # fluentd-address: fluentd:24224
        fluentd-address: 172.18.0.3:24224
        # fluentd-address: keycloak-sumologic-fluentd:24224
        tag: keycloak

  postgres:
    image: postgres:13
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: keycloak
      POSTGRES_USER: keycloak
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: password
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

  fluentd:
    build:
      context: ./fluentd
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    volumes:
      - ./fluentd/fluent.conf:/fluentd/etc/fluent.conf
      - ./keycloak/log:/fluentd/log
    # links:
    #   - keycloak
    # ports:
    #   - 24224:24224

volumes:
  postgres_data:
# networks:
#   network1:
#     name: my-pre-existing-network
